scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf app/node_modules/ && rm -rf website/node_modules && rm -rf api/node_modules && rm pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.dev: concurrently -n app,api,website -c blue,magenta,green --raw "pnpm --filter @beep/app start" "pnpm --filter @beep/api dev" "pnpm --filter @beep/website dev"
scripts.typecheck: concurrently -n app,website,api -c blue,green,yellow "pnpm --filter @beep/app typecheck" "pnpm --filter @beep/website typecheck" "pnpm --filter @beep/api build"
